description: High-reliability banking core system - Cleanroom for financial transaction processing
systemDescription: Core banking transaction processing system handling deposits, withdrawals, transfers, and balance inquiries. Processes transactions in real-time with ACID guarantees (Atomicity, Consistency, Isolation, Durability). Manages account balances, transaction logs, and audit trails. Implements fraud detection rules and regulatory compliance checks. Interfaces with ATM network, online banking, and inter-bank settlement systems. Must maintain data integrity under all conditions including system failures, network partitions, and concurrent access. Handles millions of transactions daily with zero data corruption tolerance.
notes: Financial regulations require audit trail and data integrity
ACID properties must be formally proven
Concurrency control algorithm requires mathematical correctness proof
Usage model based on typical banking transaction patterns
Balance updates must be proven to never violate consistency
Statistical testing includes high-volume concurrent transaction scenarios
Cleanroom provides confidence for financial liability protection
Incremental development allows proving correctness of each transaction type
